about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Bengaluru based B&B Triplewall Containers Limited is a company engaged in the business of manufacturing corrugated boxes and corrugated sheets.

It mainly caters to the packaging industry and has various packaging companies and MNC's as its clients. The company operates in domestic markets with its products being supplied on a PAN India basis.

The company's manufacturing facilities are situated at Bangalore and Tamil Nadu. Divided into 2 units, the fully automated units are engaged in the manufacturing of corrugated sheets and boxes.

From FY 2013-14 to FY 2017-18-

1. The total revenue of the company has grown from Rs 3,162.48 Lakh to Rs 16,697.19 Lakh, at a CAGR of 39.48%
2. The EBITDA has grown from Rs 344.42 Lakh to Rs 1,826.14 Lakh, at a CAGR of 39.60%
3. The PAT grew from Rs 67.23 Lakh to a profit of Rs 457.01 Lakh at a CAGR of
46.71%.

The company has 172 employees on the payroll.

faqs.question: What is the B&B Triplewall IPO?
faqs.answer:
B&B Triplewall IPO is a SME IPO of 5553000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹19.99 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2018, and closes on October 5, 2018.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in B&B Triplewall IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in B&B Triplewall IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in B&B Triplewall IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in B&B Triplewall IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'B&B Triplewall IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When B&B Triplewall IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The B&B Triplewall IPO opens on September 28, 2018 and closes on October 5, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of B&B Triplewall IPO?
faqs.answer: B&B Triplewall IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for B&B Triplewall IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in B&B Triplewall IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
